PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S2) ... shebang 事情 shebeen 地下酒吧 shed blood 流血.
典型的索维托之旅一般包括到传统的“席宾小酒吧（shebeen）”（Shebeen）去坐坐。在这里，你能品尝到当地的啤酒、美食，并感受到人们的热情 …
...sheathing 护套；铠装；外壳；覆盖层；外膜shebeen 下等酒店；无执照的酒店shed burn 〔烟草〕棚焦
...sheathing 护套；铠装；外壳；覆盖层；外膜shebeen 下等酒店；无执照的酒店shed burn 〔烟草〕棚焦

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Anglo-Irish síbín, from sébe 'mugful'

auth_sentence.content: There are shebeen owners who are not following the rule, but I don't want to name them.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are shebeen owners who are not following the rule, but I don't want to name them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are shebeen owners who are not following the rule, but I don't want to name them.

auth_sentence.content: But the men in the shebeen today are not men of science and they do not care for statistics.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the men in the shebeen today are not men of science and they do not care for statistics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the men in the shebeen today are not men of science and they do not care for statistics.

auth_sentence.content: We forced the shebeen owners to close their places at seven in the evening because the youths were killing one another.
auth_sentence.res_content: We forced the shebeen owners to close their places at seven in the evening because the youths were killing one another.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We forced the shebeen owners to close their places at seven in the evening because the youths were killing one another.
